column1: Kata Robata////I've heard mixed reviews about this place
column3: this was an absolutely amazing experience with delicious food. This may also be attributed to the fact that I got to try the "Omakase"
column4: which is the Chef's choice of menu
column5: and the fact that I got to sit at the sushi bar and watch them create everything in front of me and serve it to me as well.
